analysis: This module provides a suite of 2D and 3D graphics and CAD tools for design and image editing. Packages: inkscape-with-extensions for vector graphics, lensfun for lens correction, gimp-with-plugins and krita for raster editing, solvespace and openscad for parametric CAD, meshlab for mesh processing. Commented out Monado VR runtime configuration. Reasoning: Creates a comprehensive creative environment for digital art, 3D modeling, and technical drawing, with VR support prepared but not enabled.
